text: H0ary 7riv TTTHTf   gfetdhut 3*44 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ts4 qac7 ar {NTATi FTT4) Y4H Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 7 %I HIT Rt National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) d-5 & 6, d42r-10, ETD, Teari-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 26.02.2013 POLICY MAITERS-ADMNZFINANCE (104/2013) (Decision taken on FileNo 1041/21Z12O07-Admnl Subject: -Delegation of powers for other work contracts reg: As per circular No; 86/2012 dated 26.07.2012, the concerned Members were delegated full powers for sanction and approval of estimates/ works relating to operation and maintenance works unless there is a variation in which case the proposal shall be placed before the Executive Committee. 2. It has further been decided to delegate full powers to concerned Members for sanction and approval of estimates/works relating to other work contracts unless there is a variation in which case the proposal shall be placed before Executive Committee 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman: (V.K.Sharma)  Chief General Manager (Coord./LA) To; Allolticers and employees of HQIZQ[ROs[PIUs[CMUs[Site Qfices NHAI New
